items.title: Another year of IPO boom beckons in India after $19 billion record
items.description: More IPOs are on the horizon. LG Electronics is reportedly considering increasing the valuation of its India unit to as much as $15 billion, and Carlyle Group is said to be weighing an IPO of engineering services firm Quest Global.

items.title: Ventive Hospitality: Should you check into this hotel IPO?
items.description: Ventive Hospitality IPO comes at a time when the hotel industry is sustaining the up-cycle witnessed post the COVID-19 pandemic. With a valuation discount to comparable players, it is a good bet on the booming hotel space.

items.title: This week’s tactical pick is a unique play on health insurance industry
items.description: Medi Assist has demonstrated the ability to acquire companies in related businesses, successfully integrate them, and scale them up.

items.title: Listing an interesting possibility but parent could prefer owning 100%: HSBC India CEO
items.description: HSBC India is open to acquisitions to pursue growth, nothing imminent

items.title: BASF India shares rise over 5% after board nod for demerger of agri solutions business
items.description: BASF India's German parent has set out a plan to separate the agricultural solution business by 2027, in an effort to streamline and generate higher returns from its main businesses.

items.title: Maruti Suzuki to showcase 'production ready' electric Vitara at upcoming Bharat Mobility Expo
items.description: Maruti Suzuki said the eBorn SUV, which was recently unveiled by Suzuki Motor Corporation at Milan, Italy, is production ready, and a manufactured in India, for the world.
